db.description:
- Directs and manages all aspects of Housekeeping including but not limited to scheduling, staffing, quality of cleaning and guestroom and public space presentation
- Conduct regular inspections to ensure adherence to cleanliness, sanitation and maintenance standards. Inspect guest rooms, public space and back-of-the house areas continually. Coordinate room maintenance needs with the Engineering department.
- Monitor operations for compliance to safety standards.
- Develop and implement processes and procedures within Housekeeping, which support achievement of overall service and financial goals.
- Participates in daily floor walks and respond to recommendations.

- Provide associates with coaching and counseling as needed to achieve performance objectives and reach their full potential
- Recommend new equipment and amenities to ensure safety and service objectives.
- Perform regular room inspections to ensure the consistent quality of room preparation and effectiveness of existing system.
db.requirement:
- Degree in hospitality management preferred

- 3 plus years related-experience in hotel Housekeeeping Management required.

- Basic computer skills needed. Familiarity with Microsoft Office preferred.

- Strong attention to detail.

- Strong understanding of safety orientation
